title: America wide
brief_description: This multi-media presentation contains thousands of images of America (taken across all 50 states) as photographed by Australian Ken Duncan. The stunning panoramic images convey the diversity of the landscape and the beauty of nature. The images are accompanied by music composed by Andy Sorenson, with eleven separate tracks. Also includes the piece Song for America by Kathy Johnston.
